DataElement.preferredName: Abnormal Papanicolaou Smear Currently Untreated Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/no indicator to signify an abnormal pap smear that is currently untreated

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Abnormal Papanicolaou Smear Currently Untreated Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to an abnormal pap smear that is currently untreated

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Deviating from the norm.:The collection of cells from the cervix for examination under a microscope. It is used to detect changes that may be cancer or may lead to cancer, and can show noncancerous conditions, such as infection or inflammation.

Concepts.definition: Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.

A biospecimen collection and staining procedure in which secretions and superficial cells of the cervix are collected and stained with the Papanicolaou stain followed by microscopic examination to identify the presence of abnormal cells.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.
